name: beatmania IIDX INFINITAS
summary:
Reboot of beatmania IIDX INFINITAS 2015, the new version released in 2020 introduces a lot of features that has been added to the arcade games between IIDX 17 SIRIUS and IIDX 27 Heroic Verse.

Biggest difference is that they changed the old engine to a new one that is compatible with Windows 10 and allows the game to run in 120hz.

Notable Changes:

* Remade UI
* Support 120hz mode
* Engine based on IIDX 27 Heroic Verse
* Include new mods and options from the arcade version
* BEGINNER difficulty added
* Trial Mode to try it out
* Songs from newer arcade versions were added.
